---
title: "{{title}}"
subtitle: "{{subtitle}}"
author: "{{author}}"
date: "{{date}}"
format:
  pdf:
    documentclass: article
    papersize: a4
    fontsize: 11pt
    geometry:
      - margin=2.5cm
    include-in-header:
      text: |
        \usepackage{fontspec}
        \usepackage{xcolor}
        \usepackage{fancyhdr}
        \usepackage{graphicx}
        \usepackage{tcolorbox}
        \usepackage{listings}
        \usepackage{sectsty}

        % Use system fonts (Liberation Sans/Mono as fallback)
        \IfFontExistsTF{IBM Plex Sans}{
          \setmainfont{IBM Plex Sans}
        }{
          \setmainfont{Liberation Sans}
        }
        \IfFontExistsTF{IBM Plex Mono}{
          \setmonofont{IBM Plex Mono}
        }{
          \setmonofont{Liberation Mono}
        }

        % IBM Carbon Colors
        \definecolor{carbonBlue}{HTML}{0f62fe}
        \definecolor{carbonBlack}{HTML}{161616}
        \definecolor{carbonGray90}{HTML}{262626}
        \definecolor{carbonGray70}{HTML}{525252}
        \definecolor{carbonGray50}{HTML}{8d8d8d}
        \definecolor{carbonGray30}{HTML}{c6c6c6}
        \definecolor{carbonGray20}{HTML}{e0e0e0}
        \definecolor{carbonGray10}{HTML}{f4f4f4}
        \definecolor{carbonGreen}{HTML}{24a148}
        \definecolor{carbonRed}{HTML}{da1e28}
        \definecolor{carbonPurple}{HTML}{8a3ffc}
        \definecolor{carbonCyan}{HTML}{1192e8}

        % Section Formatting
        \sectionfont{\color{carbonBlack}\fontsize{32}{38}\selectfont}
        \subsectionfont{\color{carbonBlack}\fontsize{24}{28}\selectfont}
        \subsubsectionfont{\color{carbonBlack}\fontsize{18}{22}\selectfont}

        % Header and Footer
        \pagestyle{fancy}
        \fancyhf{}
        \fancyhead[R]{\color{carbonGray70}\small\textit{ {{title}} }}
        \fancyfoot[L]{\color{carbonGray70}\small {{author}} }
        \fancyfoot[C]{\color{carbonGray70}\small\thepage}
        \fancyfoot[R]{\color{carbonGray70}\small {{date}} }
        \renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0.5pt}
        \renewcommand{\footrulewidth}{0.5pt}
        \renewcommand{\headrule}{\hbox to\headwidth{\color{carbonGray20}\leaders\hrule height \headrulewidth\hfill}}
        \renewcommand{\footrule}{\hbox to\headwidth{\color{carbonGray20}\leaders\hrule height \footrulewidth\hfill}}

        % Code Blocks
        \lstset{
          basicstyle=\ttfamily\small\color{carbonBlack},
          backgroundcolor=\color{carbonGray10},
          frame=single,
          rulecolor=\color{carbonGray20},
          framesep=10pt,
          breaklines=true,
          commentstyle=\color{carbonGray70},
          keywordstyle=\color{carbonPurple}\bfseries,
          stringstyle=\color{carbonGreen},
          numberstyle=\tiny\color{carbonGray50},
          numbers=left,
          numbersep=8pt,
          tabsize=2
        }

        % Quote Blocks
        \renewenvironment{quote}
          {\begin{tcolorbox}[
            colback=carbonGray10,
            colframe=carbonBlue,
            leftrule=4pt,
            rightrule=0pt,
            toprule=0pt,
            bottomrule=0pt,
            arc=0pt,
            boxsep=5pt,
            left=10pt,
            right=10pt,
            top=8pt,
            bottom=8pt
          ]\itshape\color{carbonGray70}}
          {\end{tcolorbox}}

        % Hyperlinks
        \usepackage{hyperref}
        \hypersetup{
          colorlinks=true,
          linkcolor=carbonBlue,
          urlcolor=carbonBlue,
          citecolor=carbonBlue
        }
---

{{content}}
